description: Session diagnostics: enriched telemetry logging (browser, OS, screen, hardware) and new Diagnostics section in ResponseDetails for debugging participant mic/audio issues.

changes.description: Enrich participant telemetry with browser name/version, OS, screen size, device memory, CPU cores, timezone, and color depth â€” logged automatically during practice/main calls and feedback page load.

details.summary: participant-telemetry.ts: added parseBrowserName/Version/OsName helpers and expanded ClientTelemetryContext. FeedbackQuestionnaire: logs feedback_page_context event on load (SpeechRecognition support, MediaRecorder support, MIME type support map, full device context). ResponseDetails: new Diagnostics nav section showing device/browser info, feedback-page audio support (MIME chips), and mic diagnostics by stage (practice/main/feedback).
